titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Gianni Emilio Simonetti Papers
titlestmt.author: By Beinecke staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday January 22, 2019 at 06:00
profiledesc.descrules: translation missing: en.enumerations.resource_finding_aid_description_rules.Describing Archives: A Content Standard

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: The Gianni Emilio Simonetti papers, which span from circa 1960 to 2017, contain writings, photographs, posters, and other papers by or relating to Gianni Emilio Simonetti.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
Box 17 (record albums): Restricted fragile material. Consult Access Services for further information.
Box 18 (film): Restricted fragile material. Consult Access Services for further information.
Box 19 (born digital): Restricted fragile material. Access copies of digital files may be requested. Consult Access Services for further information.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Purchased from L'Arengario Studio Bibliografico on the Edwin J. Beinecke Book Fund, 2017.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into six series: I. Writings, 1960-2017. II. Correspondence, 1965-2017. III. Flyers, Programs, and Documentation From Events and Talks, 1960-2017. IV. Printed Material, 1965-2014. V. Audiovisual Materials, 1965-2016. VI. Electronic Media, 2000-2017.

bioghist.head: Gianni Emilio Simonetti
bioghist.p: Gianni Emilio Simonetti (1940-) is an Italian multidiscplinary artist, writer, and performer most frequently associated with the Situationist movement and the Fluxus group.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gianni Emilio Simonetti Papers. General Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collections are processed to a variety of levels, depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived research value, the availability of staff, competing priorities, and whether or not further accruals are expected. The library attempts to provide a basic level of preservation and access for all collections as they are acquired, and does more extensive processing of higher priority collections as time and resources permit.
This collection received a basic level of processing, including rehousing and minimal organization.

Information included in the Description of Papers note and Collection Contents section is drawn from information supplied with the collection and from an initial survey of the contents. Folder titles appearing in the contents list below are often based on those provided by the creator or previous custodian. Titles have not been verified against the contents of the folders in all cases. Otherwise, folder titles are supplied by staff during initial processing.
This finding aid may be updated periodically to account for new acquisitions to the collection and/or revisions in arrangement and description.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: The Gianni Emilio Simonetti papers, which span from circa 1960 to 2017, contain writings, photographs, posters, and other papers by or relating to Gianni Emilio Simonetti.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Gianni Emilio Simonetti Papers is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

did.unittitle: Drafts with corrections and notes with corrections

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Titles included are Sull'espressionismo in Gernerale, Autonomia E Dipendenza Del Topos Politico, Battery Park, Tesi Sul Fascismo, La Nouvella Cuisine, Quatrtrocento Colpi "Par Rys", Sulla Cultura Della Reazione E La Sua Forma Metapolitica, La Svolta Di Portland, Sulla Glaciazione Teatrale, Pasta Set Multi-Purpose Boiling Unit and Steamer, Madam Bovary O La Forma Del Decoro, Introdusione All'Intelligenza Della Modernita', Il pensiero della pittura pensa la pittura?, Lettera Aperta Ai Veggenti Da Un Non-Vedente, Stato Tecnico E Mondo, Timing, Desabusement Et Matiere De La Critique Dans La Vie Courante, Quaderno Secondo, Bozza Intoduttiva, Thierry Maulnier, Mercadet L'Affarista. Un'Apologia and others.

did.unittitle: Condimenti - Una Storia Sociale Della Salse

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondents include Allen de Loach, Edoardo Sanguineti, A. Foner Cohen, Dr. Ricardo Bauer, Allain Arias-Misson, Henry Flint, G. Schneemann, Jeff Berner, Mieko Shiomi, Milan Grygar, Jan van der Mack, Carolee Schneemann, Tim Ulrichs, D. Clive Hardy, The Something Else Press Inc. (Dick Higgins), Andrea Barbate, Luigi Lambertini, Giuseppe Chiari, Maurizio Spatola, John Wilcock, H. Sohm, Urban Gwerder, Frans Denissen, David Briers, Ugo Nespolo, Vittore Querel, Marcel Ianco, Gillian Heiser, Gil Fishman, Bill Balls, John Shuttleworth, Dennis Crompton, Mariarosa Sclauzero, Jack Marchal, Marco Tarchi, Raffaelle Ruffolo, and others.

did.unittitle: Writings, projects, exhibitions and collaborations with related correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Writings include "APPUNTI PER UN SIRONI AUTRE", "The Tokyo Manifesto of the Spatialism:1968", and others. Correspondents include Maude Nussbaum, Ivo Vroom, Dan Mcleod, Andrea Granchi, Domenico Giuffre, Jeff Keen, Council for Social Development, Veronica Lupton, Kozo Yoshida, Alberto Gini, Riccardo Boglione, C.C. Berg, Riccardo Foglione, Giacomo Mazzone, Paola Bertola, Carl Weissner, David W. Harris, John Esam, E. Battisti, Salvatore Giuliano, Seiichi Niikuni, Angry Arts,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondents include Caro Sergio, Ben Vautier, and others.

did.unittitle: Flyers, programs, and documentation from talks and events

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Flyers, programs and other materials from talks and events attended by Simonetti.
